notes.desc: get endpoints return 404 if resource is not found.
if partition is empty string, then INS is selected for items
if partition is empty string, then REF is selected for models
detect hstore changes on item updates
detect hstore changes on item type updates
user not set when AuthMode=none, default to anonymous user
query meta with filter returns a single result entry if only one path expression is defined in the filter as opposed to a map with one entry
